hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mes’ud (r.a.)’den rivayete göre, Rasulullah (Sallallahu aleyhi ve Sellem) şöyle buyurmuştur: “Orta namaz ikindi namazıdır” Diğer tahric: Nesai, Mevakit; İbn Mace, Salat Tirmîzî: Bu hadis hasen sahihtir

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الْوُسْطَى أَنَّهَا الْعَصْرُ وَقَدْ قِيلَ إِنَّهَا الظُّهْرُ
chapter.eng-name: : What Has Been Related About "Salatul-Wusta" [And It Has Been Said That It Is Zuhr]
